string.value: You can vastly improve your firepower by collecting extra weapons.
Keep away from water - it can destroy your vehicle faster than the mightiest foe.
You can look around by holding the middle mouse button.
GPS navigation system is a standard device of your vehicle, it always shows the correct movement direction.
You can greatly improve your wealth by finding and collecting bonuses.
Remember that a static target is an easy prey. Maneuver more.
Use level features to vanquish your enemies.
Ramming is a good old trick against the enemies that drive light vehicles.
Government rewards you for every destroyed enemy.
Mutant mushrooms are dangerous for all life forms. Colliding with one may propel you high up in the air.
Government reward for destroying spore-emitting mutant mushrooms is issued at the end of the mission.
Machine gun is an all-round choice for armament. The third level of upgrade gives you a permanent second weapon.
Twin machine gun is the ultimate way to deal with severe mutant fungi infestations.
Shotgun is great at taking out entire groups of enemies. The fully upgraded weapon boasts explosive ammo.
Flak cannon is a versatile weapon that is also great at dealing with heavily armored foes.
Rocket launcher is a weapon that is ideal for destroying enemies from a long distance.
Briefings provide vital information about upcoming missions. Choose your weaponry and equipment accordingly.
All control keys are listed in the "Help" window, which can be accessed by pressing the F1 key.
Press the Space key to engage the Jumping device.
Hold the Alt key to use the Turbo.
If your vehicle seems to be stuck, you can try using the "Get out of a difficult spot" feature by pressing O.
Shooting from auxiliary weapon is done by pressing the right mouse button.
If you have a minelayer installed, press E to place a landmine behind your vehicle.
